thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Telenet ‍Successful Issuance And Pricing Of Existing Term Loan AL​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Telenet ‍Successful Issuance And Pricing Of Existing Term Loan AL​
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - TELENET GROUP HOLDING NV:
* ‍SUCCESSFUL ISSUANCE AND PRICING OF A USD 300.0 MILLION UPSIZE OF EXISTING TERM LOAN AL​
* TERM LOAN‘FACILITY AL2’ CARRIES SAME CHARACTERISTICS AS INITIAL FACILITY AL
* FACILITY AL2 CARRIES A MARGIN OF 2.50% OVER LIBOR, A 0% LIBOR FLOOR AND A MATURITY OF MARCH 1, 2026
* FACILITY AL2 WAS SUCCESSFULLY ISSUED AT PAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
